title: Robin Campbell: old feller now: memories of a Muruawarri
creator_credit: Alec Morgan, Martha Ansara and Goodgabah Productions
brief_description: Robin Campbell, an old man of the Murrawarri tribe of the far north west of New South Wales recalls, through dramatic re-enactments by his young relations, how he was taught, as a child, to hunt the emu and make animal tracks, and how he worked as a drover in the 1930’s and 40’s. Narrated by Bill Reid.
